entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -1.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 1:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
